Model Layer¶

Manages interaction with the database

class tangaza.Tangaza.models.Actions(*args, **kwargs)¶
Actions by users of the system
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.AdminGroupHistory(*args, **kwargs)¶
Logs all actions performed by the administrators of vikundi
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.Calls(*args, **kwargs)¶
Logs all calls made to the system
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.Countries(*args, **kwargs)¶
Countries(id, country_code, country_name)
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.Dlr(*args, **kwargs)¶
This should be automatically populated by kannel for each new sms
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.GroupAdmin(*args, **kwargs)¶
Intermediary table for the administrators of vikundi
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.Invitations(*args, **kwargs)¶
Invitations sent to join a particular group. To be a member of a private group/vikundi you have to either be invited or added directly by the system admin of the organization
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.Languages(*args, **kwargs)¶
Languages(id, name)
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.Organization(*args, **kwargs)¶

Organization(id, org_name, org_admin_id, toll_free_number, is_active)

activate()¶
Reactivates previously deactivated organizations so that they can use Tangaza
deactivate()¶
Users in deactivated organizations should not be able to use Tangaza
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.PubMessages(*args, **kwargs)¶
Each new message sent by a user is a pub message. (See sub message)
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.SmsLog(*args, **kwargs)¶
Keeps a log of all smses received by the system
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.SubMessages(*args, **kwargs)¶
A message associated with a member. A message is sent to vikundi but each member of vikundi has to handle it differently
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.TermsAndPrivacy(*args, **kwargs)¶
Users have to accept the terms and privacy statements before they start using the system
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.UserGroupHistory(*args, **kwargs)¶
Logs all actions performed by a member of vikundi
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.UserGroups(*args, **kwargs)¶
Intermdiate table that links members to vikundi
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.UserPhones(*args, **kwargs)¶
UserPhones(id, country_id, phone_number, user_id, is_primary)
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.Vikundi(*args, **kwargs)¶

A group within Tangaza. People using Tangaza have to be members to send/receive messages Types: Mine - Personal. Only the owner can send messages. You have to be invited to join Private - You can only send messages if you are a member. You have to be invited to join Public - Anyone can send messages to these. You can join without being invited

activate()¶
You can only send/receive messages if active
classmethod create(user, group_name, slot, group_type='private', org=None)¶
Creates a group with group admin and user groups associations and returns the created group
deactivate()¶
You can only send/receive messages if active
classmethod is_valid_type(type_name)¶
Checks that the group type the user selected is valid
classmethod quiet_all(user)¶
Disable updates from all vikundi for this particular user
classmethod resolve(user, name_or_slot)¶
Resolves the slot number or group name and returns the associated group
send_msg(user, text, origin)¶
Sends the text message to all members of the group Origin is set so that the system knows what sms gateway to use. Default is ke
set_quiet(user)¶
Disable updates from this vikundi for this particular user
unquiet(user)¶
Enable user to start receiving updates from this group again
classmethod unquiet_all(user)¶
Enables updates from all vikundi
class tangaza.Tangaza.models.Watumiaji(*args, **kwargs)¶

This is the profile for membership in Tangaza groups. For Any user to be able to communicate using tangaza they need such a profile

can_send(group)¶
Returns True if the user can send, otherwise returns False You can only send messages to a group that you are a member of or if its a public group
classmethod create_user(phone, own_group)¶
Creates a user with group type mine and assigns phone as primary phone number
get_used_slots()¶
Slots represent the number on the keypad assigned to a group All users (except the super user) have maximum 9 slots
is_mine(group)¶
Checks if the member owns the vikundi/group
leave_group(group)¶
When a user leaves, this deletes any links to vikundi in the UserGroups and GroupAdmin tables in the database
classmethod resolve(phone)¶
Resolves the phone number provided and returns the member associated with it
classmethod resolve_or_create(request, invoking_user, language, phone)¶
Works similar to resolve() but creates the member if they do not exist, then returns the associated member object
set_name(name)¶
Set the member’s nickname
